name: Ghost Whisperer (itch)
description:
Ghost Whisperer

Made for Narrative Driven Jam #6.

Ghost Whisperer is brought to you by the marvelous Joss! Equipped with her trusted ghost interpreter, Joss travels across the country to hear what ghosts have on their minds and assist in settling their unfinished business. So if you have a ghost you'd like helped to the other side, give us a call!

The Team:
  • FalseTrout : Sound (itch.io)
  • IfThenCreate (she/her): Tech (itch.io)
  • LaChapeliere (she/her): Writing (itch.io)
  • Nightsparrow: Visuals (itch.io)
